485190.name: Astro Lords: Experienced Mentor
485190.description:
The officers from this package will help you to easily reduce the amount of experience gained by your captains.
This package is best suited for mentors of schools, as well as for players who wish to participate in low-level battles.

The package includes officers that reduce the amount of experience gained by your captains.

DLC "Experienced Tutor" includes:

Officers:
  • "Lou" Black Widow "Dean" Bronze experience gained by the captain -15%
    "Lou" Black Widow "Dean" Silver experience gained by the captain -30%
    "Lou" Black Widow "Dean" Gold experience gained by the captain -50%

How to use the DLC:
  • After purchase, the DLC will appear in your library, to get it, you just need to enter the game
  • Your DLC will appear in the Advisor window, select it and press the button: Collect the reward
  • Enjoy your DLC!

Attention, important!

In order to use the DLC, you must have completed the Tutorial in the game.
485190.supported_languages:
俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
